DataElement.preferredName: Patient Death Most Recent Cancer Survivorship Research Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the most recent date that research into information concerning the death of a patient was performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Death Most Recent Cancer Survivorship Research Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the most recent (nearest to the present time) cancer survivorship research (research on cancer survivors) performed (carried out) and the death (the absence of life or state of being dead) of a patient (a person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Death Most Recent Cancer Survivorship Research Performed
Property.preferredDefinition: The absence of life or state of being dead.:Nearest to the present time.:Research on cancer survivors, covers the full spectrum of biomedical and psycho-social issues that arise at the point of discontinuation of cancer-specific therapy to the point of terminal diagnosis (6 months or less to live).:Performed; carried out.

Concepts.definition: This gene plays a role in apoptosis, inflammation, septic shock, and wound healing.

Research on cancer survivors, covers the full spectrum of biomedical and psycho-social issues that arise at the point of discontinuation of cancer-specific therapy to the point of terminal diagnosis (6 months or less to live).
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: justification for or explanation of the administration or cessation of therapy.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
